This order multiplies your returns by x.
This order could be liquidated if its losses exceed a certain threshold (which will be displayed). If that happens, a large portion of your stake will be lost. Learn More
You staked KRO to invest in .
If the margin position price falls below the liquidation price, this order will be liquidated, which will cause huge losses. When the order is in danger of liquidation, sell it.
You have successfully sold the investment and redeemed your Kairo.
You have successfully topped up the order.

During the Intermission phase of each cycle, the managers may decide to initiate an upgrade via a simple majority vote using their Kairo tokens. If the vote passed, then during the Manage phase, managers may use their Kairo to vote on which smart contract should be accepted as the new version. Learn more

trans-unit.source: Time of the upgrade governance system's activation
You have not received any commission yet
Redeem commisssion for a particular cycle
Only use this when normal redemption fails

You can redeem your commissions in Betoken fund shares (BTKS) - meaning you swap your commissions for an equivalent number of shares in the fund. By doing so, you will make the fund Assets Under Management (AUM) grow quicker. A bigger AUM means more money to manage in the next cycle, and more commissions for you.
I want to buy Betoken Shares with
How many shares do you want to sell?
If you think 2 brains are better than one...How about hundreds of talented asset managers working for you? Worldwide!
Your capital is automatically distributed among Betokenâ€™s community of managers. The best of them will have the most influence over how that capital is put to work.
By connecting your capital to Betoken protocol, you gain exposure to ETH, WBTC, BAT, MKR and 70+ ERC20 tokens.
Betoken allows anyone to buy or sell any amount of Betoken Shares, and Betoken's fee structure is completely transparent. More about fees, lockup, and liquidity
You always stay in control, itâ€™s written on the blockchain. All user funds are locked in smart contracts, no one but you has direct access to those funds.
Can I buy and sell Betoken Shares at any time?

Yes. Betoken's protocol is 100% liquid. You can buy and sell BTKS at any time in 2 ways: During Betoken's 3 days intermission phase that happens every 27 days, you can buy and sell BTKS directly on the investor dashboard. (Coming soon) During Betoken's management phase (27 days), BTKS token is freely tradable on decentralized exchanges. Depending of the market conditions, the price may be different from what's displayed on the investor dashboard.
How can I buy Betoken Shares?
Click on the Get Started button and follow the instructions. You'll be able to use Ether or any of our 70+ supported ERC-20 tokens to buy Betoken Shares (BTKS).
After the management phase is over (every 27 days):
IF the fund is profitable OR not profitable

0.1% of the total Betoken funds is set aside and distributed among fund manager holding Kairo. In order to provide funding for its maintenance and future development, Betoken protocol will mint Betoken Shares and send them to the current development team. The amount will be equal to 0.1% of the current Betoken Shares total supply, and it will occur at the end of every investment cycle.
ONLY IF the fund is profitable

20% of the total Betoken's monthly profits is set aside as commission and distributed among fund managers holding Kairo proportional to the amount they hold and their risk profile. The commission is taken into account IF and ONLY IF the fund is profitable during the actual investment cycle.
How can I follow the activity of the fund?
You have access to a dashboard where you can view your capital account.
I want to buy Betoken Shares with
Connect your crypto-trading expertise to the Betoken's pool of capital and earn commissions!
The best managers earn the most

The Betoken protocol recognizes and quantifies the talent of its fund managers by allocating units of reputation to them, denominated in Kairo tokens, and financially rewards them based on their talent and contributions. The more Kairo tokens you have, the more money in the Betoken fund you can manage and the more income youâ€™ll get every month as commissions on your investments. More about Betoken's commissions structure

Betoken uses the full value of the open finance ecosystem like Kyber Network, Compound, Fulcrum by bZx and DAI stable coin. These financial primitives enable margin trading with up to 4x leverage on Betoken and guaranteed liquidity.

Kairo is Betoken's non-transferable reputation token. Managers need to possess Kairo tokens to manage funds on Betoken. Kairo represents how good a manager is at investing. The more Kairo tokens you have, the more money in the Betoken fund you can manage and the more income youâ€™ll get every month as commissions on your investments.
How can I buy Kairo tokens?
Click on the Get Started button and follow the instructions. You'll be able to use Ether or any of our 70+ supported ERC-20 tokens to buy Kairo tokens (KRO).
Do I receive my Kairo immediately after purchase?
Yes. The Kairo will be given to your wallet after your purchase transaction has been accepted by the Ethereum blockchain, which may take up to a few minutes.
After the management phase is over (every 27 days):
IF the fund is profitable OR not profitable
0.1% of the total Betoken funds is set aside and distributed among fund manager holding Kairo.
ONLY IF the fund is profitable

20% of the total Betoken's monthly profits is set aside as commission and distributed among fund managers holding Kairo proportional to the amount they hold and their risk profile. The commission is taken into account IF and ONLY IF the fund is profitable during the actual investment cycle.
How can I manage and follow the activity of the fund?
You have access to a Portal where you can view Betoken's fund performances and your manager trading interface.
Can I sell my Kairo tokens?
No. Kairo is a non-transferable reputation token, which means that you cannot sell or give your Kairo to someone else.
Can I buy more Kairo after with the same Wallet address?
No. You can only buy Kairo tokens once per Ethereum account. More about Kairo distribution and price.
How many Kairo do you want to buy?
I want to buy Kairo with
Your ranking among Betoken's managers based on your Kairo balance
Number of fund managers actively managing Betoken's assets.
The more Kairo you stake, the more of Betoken's money you put at work, the more commissions you earn.
illustration Woman and dog with a active spinner

20% of the fund's profit and 0.1% of the AUM is set aside as commissions every month, which is paid to managers proportional to the Kairo they hold. The estimate displayed here is calculated using the current fund ROI.
The total amount of commission you have received throughout your manager career.
cycle for which to redeem commission
The amount of Betoken Shares (BTKS) you own.
The value of your Betoken Shares, in DAI Stablecoin.
The price of 1 Betoken Share token.

A maximum drawdown (MDD) is the maximum observed loss from a peak to a trough of a portfolio, before a new peak is attained. Maximum drawdown is an indicator of downside risk over a specified time period.
Amount of Betoken's AUM you manage. The more Kairo you own, the more money you will manage.
The more Kairo you own, the more money you will manage, the more commission you will receive. You will be able to earn Kairo by making profitable investments for the Betoken fund.

20% of the fund's profit and 0.1% of the AUM is set aside as commissions every month, which is paid to managers proportional to the Kairo they hold. The estimate displayed here is calculated using the current fund ROI.
Standard deviation represents the volatility of an asset. The number shown here is the sample standard deviation of Betoken Shares' price since inception.
Betoken Smart Contracts are audited and secured by Solidified

Nothing herein constitutes an offer to sell, or the solicitation of an offer to buy, any securities or tokens.

Betoken enables capital connection and managing using smart contracts which are open source. Betoken does not take custody of tokens and is only a collaborative hub for investors and managers. Betoken is not a licensed bank, broker-dealer, investment advisor or an exchange. Betoken uses partner protocols (Kyber, Compound, bZx, Maker DAO) to power its own ecosystem.
